audioText: Vous travailliez obscurément sur les questions de gouvernance d'entreprise sans révéler vos véritables intentions aux actionnaires.
question: How were you working on corporate governance issues?
options: Obscurely without revealing your true intentions to shareholders
Transparently by providing detailed reports to all stakeholders
Collaboratively with external consultants and legal experts
Systematically following established industry best practices
explanation: The correct answer is 'Obscurely without revealing your true intentions to shareholders'. The text states 'Vous travailliez obscurément sur les questions de gouvernance d'entreprise sans révéler vos véritables intentions aux actionnaires' - You were working obscurely on corporate governance issues without revealing your true intentions to shareholders. 'Travailliez' is the second-person plural imperfect of 'travailler' (to work), and 'obscurément' means 'obscurely'.
source: Strategic vocabulary development - corporate governance context
